mapper.select: SELECT i.id,i.shelfid,i.materialid,s.`name` shelfname,i.quantity,i.size, m.sku,m.name,p.location image, s.treepath FROM t_erp_warehouse_shelf_inventory i left join t_erp_material m on m.id=i.materialid left join t_picture p on p.id=m.image left join t_erp_warehouse_shelf s on s.id=i.shelfid and s.shopid=i.shopid where s.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and s.addressid=#{addressid,jdbcType=CHAR} and i.materialid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR} and s.isdelete=0 and i.quantity>0 order by i.opttime asc
